Classes in org.cloudifysource.dsl used by org.cloudifysource.dsl
AppSharedIsolationSLADescriptor
          This class defines a service deployment which is shared across all machines that are provisioned for the same application in the cluster.
ComputeDetails
          Domain Object for compute settings required for a specific service.
DataGrid
          Defines an elastic deployment of a partitioned data grid (space).

          This class defines a dedicated service deployment.
GlobalIsolationSLADescriptor
          This class defines a service deployment which is shared across all machines in the cluster.

Memcached

          Domain POJO for a plugin descriptor.
Service
          The POJO for a service running in Cloudify.
ServiceLifecycle
          Domain POJO of the service lifecycle, part of the Service Recipe declaration.
ServiceNetwork
          Configuration of network elements of a specific service.

SharedIsolationSLADescriptor

StatefulProcessingUnit
          Defines an elastic deployment of a processing unit that contains an embedded space.
StatelessProcessingUnit
          Defines an elastic processing unit deployment that does not contain a space.
StorageDetails
          Domain Object for storage settings required for a specific service.
TenantSharedIsolationSLADescriptor
          This class defines a service deployment which is shared across all machines that are provisioned for the same tenant in the cluster.
 

Classes in org.cloudifysource.dsl used by org.cloudifysource.dsl.cloud
DSLValidation
          An annotation marking a method in a Cloudify DSL POJO as a validation method, which will be executed after the object has been fully initialized.
 

Classes in org.cloudifysource.dsl used by org.cloudifysource.dsl.cloud.compute
DSLValidation
          An annotation marking a method in a Cloudify DSL POJO as a validation method, which will be executed after the object has been fully initialized.
